00011 #include "CfbEndMove.h"
00012 #include <mcMd/mcSimulation/McSystem.h>
00013 #include <mcMd/simulation/Simulation.h>
00014 #ifndef INTER_NOPAIR
00015 #include <mcMd/potentials/pair/McPairPotential.h>
00016 #endif
00017 #include <mcMd/species/Linear.h>
00018 #include <util/boundary/Boundary.h>
00019 #include <mcMd/chemistry/Molecule.h>
00020 #include <mcMd/chemistry/Bond.h>
00021 #include <mcMd/chemistry/Atom.h>

00027    using namespace Util;

00029    /* 
00030    * Constructor
00031    */
00032    CfbEndMove::CfbEndMove(McSystem& system) : 
00033       CfbEndBase(system),
00034       speciesId_(-1),
00035       nRegrow_(-1)
00036    {} 
00037    
00038    /* 
00039    * Read parameters speciesId, nRegrow, and nTrial
00040    */
00041    void CfbEndMove::readParam(std::istream& in) 
00042    {
00043       // Read parameters
00044       readProbability(in);
00045       read<int>(in, "speciesId", speciesId_);
00046       read<int>(in, "nRegrow", nRegrow_);
00047       read<int>(in, "nTrial", nTrial_);
00048 
00049       // Check that 0 < nTrial_ <= MaxTrial
00050       if (nTrial_ <=0 || nTrial_ > MaxTrial_) {
00051          UTIL_THROW("Invalid value input for nTrial");
00052       }
00053 
00054       // Use dynamic_cast to check that the Species is actually a Linear species
00055       Linear* chainPtr;
00056       chainPtr = dynamic_cast<Linear*>(&(simulation().species(speciesId_)));
00057   
00058       // Allocate array to store old positions 
00059       oldPos_.allocate(nRegrow_); 
00060    }
00061 
00062    /* 
00063    * Generate, attempt and accept or reject a Monte Carlo move.
00064    */
00065    bool CfbEndMove::move() 
00066    {
00067       double    rosenbluth, rosen_r,  rosen_f;
00068       double    energy, energy_r, energy_f;
00069       Atom     *endPtr;   // pointer to the current end atom
00070       Atom     *pvtPtr;   // pointer to "pivot" atom, which is bonded to the end atom
00071       Molecule *molPtr;   // pointer to randomly chosen molecule
00072       int       length, sign, beginId, endId, bondType, i;
00073       bool      accept;
00074      
00075       incrementNAttempt();
00076     
00077       // Choose a molecule at random
00078       molPtr = &(system().randomMolecule(speciesId_));
00079       length = molPtr->nAtom();
00080 
00081       // Require that chain length > nRegrow
00082       if (nRegrow_ >= length) {
00083          UTIL_THROW("nRegrow_  >= chain length");
00084       }
00085 
00086       // Choose which chain end to regrow
00087       if (random().uniform(0.0, 1.0) > 0.5) {
00088          sign = +1;
00089          beginId = length - nRegrow_;
00090          endId   = length - 1;
00091       } else {
00092          sign = -1;
00093          beginId = nRegrow_ - 1;
00094          endId   = 0;
00095       }
00096    
00097       // Store current atomic positions from segment to be regrown
00098       endPtr = &(molPtr->atom(beginId));
00099       for (i = 0; i < nRegrow_; ++i) {
00100          oldPos_[i] = endPtr->position();
00101          endPtr += sign;
00102       }
00103    
00104       // Delete monomers, starting from chain end
00105       rosen_r  = 1.0;
00106       energy_r = 0.0;
00107       endPtr = &(molPtr->atom(endId));
00108       for (i = 0; i < nRegrow_; ++i) {
00109          pvtPtr  = endPtr - sign;
00110          if (sign == 1) {
00111             bondType = molPtr->bond(endId - 1 - i).typeId();
00112          } else {
00113             bondType = molPtr->bond(i).typeId();
00114          }
00115          deleteEndAtom(endPtr, pvtPtr, bondType, rosenbluth, energy);
00116          #ifndef INTER_NOPAIR
00117          system().pairPotential().deleteAtom(*endPtr);
00118          #endif
00119          rosen_r  *= rosenbluth;
00120          energy_r += energy;
00121          endPtr -= sign;
00122       }
00123    
00124       // Regrow monomers
00125       rosen_f  = 1.0;
00126       energy_f = 0.0;
00127       endPtr = &(molPtr->atom(beginId));
00128       for (i = 0; i < nRegrow_; ++i) {
00129          pvtPtr = endPtr - sign;
00130          if (sign == 1) {
00131             bondType = molPtr->bond(endId - 1 - i).typeId();
00132          } else {
00133             bondType = molPtr->bond(i).typeId();
00134          }
00135          addEndAtom(endPtr, pvtPtr, bondType, rosenbluth, energy);
00136          rosen_f  *= rosenbluth;
00137          energy_f += energy;
00138 
00139          #ifndef INTER_NOPAIR
00140          // Add end atom to McSystem cell list
00141          system().pairPotential().addAtom(*endPtr);
00142          #endif
00143 
00144          endPtr += sign;
00145       }
00146    
00147       // Decide whether to accept or reject
00148       accept = random().metropolis(rosen_f/rosen_r);
00149       if (accept) {
00150 
00151          // Increment counter for accepted moves of this class.
00152          incrementNAccept();
00153 
00154          // If the move is accepted, keep current positions.
00155 
00156       } else {
00157 
00158          // If the move is rejected, restore old positions
00159          endPtr = &(molPtr->atom(beginId));
00160          for (i = 0; i < nRegrow_; ++i) {
00161             // system().moveAtom(*endPtr, oldPos_[i]);
00162             endPtr->position() = oldPos_[i];
00163             #ifndef INTER_NOPAIR
00164             system().pairPotential().updateAtomCell(*endPtr);
00165             #endif
00166             endPtr += sign;
00167          }
00168    
00169       }
00170 
00171       return accept;
00172    
00173    }
00174 }
00175 #endif
